description: A person who wishes to protect a transaction for value, such as purchase, lease or charge, may make an official search of whole with priority against either the whole or part of a registered title or pending first registration.
title: Land Registry: searches of whole register

department.title: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills

transaction.title: Land Registry: searches of whole register

description-extra: The effect of the official search with priority is to “freeze” the title to allow the application to be lodged. This protected application takes priority over other applications lodged within the priority period.
costs: Applications can be received via different channels, requiring different processes and may contain multiple transactions. The published cost per transaction is therefore an average cost, including apportioned overheads, based on Land Registry’s 2011/12 published accounts.

modules.title: Transactions per year
info: Data source: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills

modules.title: Total cost
info: Applications can be received via different channels, requiring different processes and may contain multiple transactions. The published cost per transaction is therefore an average cost, including apportioned overheads, based on Land Registry’s 2011/12 published accounts.
Data source: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills

Total cost is the overall cost per year of providing a service, including staff, IT and accommodation costs; the total cost is automatically calculated from volume and cost per transaction figures, and some rounding errors may occur.

modules.title: Cost per transaction
info: Applications can be received via different channels, requiring different processes and may contain multiple transactions. The published cost per transaction is therefore an average cost, including apportioned overheads, based on Land Registry’s 2011/12 published accounts.
Data source: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills
Cost per transaction is the average cost of providing each successfully completed transaction, across all channels. Staff, IT and accommodation costs should be included.

modules.title: Transactions per quarter
modules.description: Total number of transactions each quarter
info: Data source: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills

modules.title: Digital take-up
info: Data source: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills
Digital take-up measures the percentage of completed applications that are made through a digital channel versus non-digital channels.
